QuestData.Title: Big Bad Wolves
QuestData.Description:
Wolves with strange, glowing eyes have taken over the area! I don't know what they are or why they're glowing but it cannot mean anything good. They have to be removed!
Please, $c, slay them before more of my friends are killed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Hexed Howlers in Carver's Harbor.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get rid of those beasts?
QuestData.RewardText: With those monsters gone, no more of my people are going to get killed.
